This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
a='apple'
b='apple'

if(a==b){
  print('This is an apple')
}else{
  print('nah, Not an apple')
}

ifelse(a==b, 'This is an apple','no')

  print('sth')
}else if(a=='pear'){
  print('This is a pear')
}else{
  print('This is something else')
}

d = c('apple','banana','apple','pear')

ifelse(d=='apple', 'Right!','Nah')


options(stringsAsFactors = F)
 d = read.csv('https://www.dropbox.com/s/he7r6v4hxu0ibno/tableS1.Sanders2018.txt?dl=1', sep='\t')
ifelse(d$PatientSex=='F', 'Female', 'Not Female')
ifelse(d$PatientSex %in% c('M','F'), 'Reported', 'Unknwon')

grepl('apple', a)
a
grepl('appl', a)

fahrenheit_to_celsius <- function(temp_F) {
  temp_C <- (temp_F - 32) * 5 / 9
  return(temp_C)
}
# return? 함수를 실행한후 나온 값 하나를 출력한다
# temp_C2 = temp_C 를 한후 temp_C2, temp_C 중하나 선택 할수도 있다.
fahrenheit_to_celsius(80)

for (i in c(80,90,100,2000)) {
  print(fahrenheit_to_celsius(i))
}
# install.packages("ggplot2")
library(ggplot2)
ggplot2::geom_abline()

library(dplyr)
?stats::filter()
?filter
# 패키지마다 중복 이름의 함수가 있을수도 있다.
```

Add a new chunk by clicking the *Insert Chunk* button on the toolbar or by pressing *Ctrl+Alt+I*.

When you save the notebook, an HTML file containing the code and output will be saved alongside it (click the *Preview* button or press *Ctrl+Shift+K* to preview the HTML file).

The preview shows you a rendered HTML copy of the contents of the editor. Consequently, unlike *Knit*, *Preview* does not run any R code chunks. Instead, the output of the chunk when it was last run in the editor is displayed.
